author: Claire O'Connell
title: Bats, pangolins and viral Lego: curious clues of the new coronavirus
description: ‘We need to look at why horseshoe bats don’t get sick from coronavirus’ – Irish scientist
content: How did Covid-19 come to be? Its a puzzle that involves tolerant bats, possibly middlemen pangolins and a virus that gathered structures and tricks along the way and jumped into humans. The resulting virus, Sars-CoV-2, has caused the sort of pandemic that sci… [+4306 chars]
